fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • Owing to an editing error, an obituary said the sports journalist Hugh McIlvanney had three brothers. He had a sister and two brothers (Pre-eminent sports journalist who would not compromise the truth, 26 January, Journal, page 8). Other recently corrected articles include: A letter to … the couple who died in my house The Coddling of the American Mind review – how elite US liberals have turned rightwards Deadly rabbit virus threatens UK brown hare population
